properties.name: auto-pan
properties.description: Whether map will be dragged to info window or not.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position of info window on map.

properties.name: attach-to-marker
properties.description: Whether info window is attached to marker or map.

events.name: close-click
events.description: Raised when info window is closed.

events.name: position-changed
events.description: Raised when position of info window is changed.

events.name: zindex-changed
events.description: Raised when z index is changed.
